code: import React from'react';import{MapContainer,TileLayer,Marker,Popup}from'react-leaflet';import L from'leaflet';import'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css';import{Paper,Typography}from'@mui/material';// Fix for default marker icons in Leaflet import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";delete L.Icon.Default.prototype._getIconUrl;L.Icon.Default.mergeOptions({iconRetinaUrl:require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-icon-2x.png'),iconUrl:require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-icon.png'),shadowUrl:require('leaflet/dist/images/marker-shadow.png')});const Map=()=>{// Replace with your city's latitude and longitude const cityCoordinates=[14.628434,-90.522713];// Example: London return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,style:{padding:'16px',margin:'16px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",gutterBottom:true,children:"Map of THE City"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MapContainer,{center:cityCoordinates,zoom:15,style:{height:'600px',width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TileLayer,{url:"https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",attribution:"\xA9 OpenStreetMap contributors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marker,{position:cityCoordinates,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Popup,{children:"Your City"})})]})]});};export default Map;
